description: Access Shodan's API to enhance your AI assistant's capabilities. Query detailed information about internet-connected devices and services to bolster cybersecurity research and threat intelligence. Simplify your data retrieval with advanced search functionalities and result summarization.

capabilities.name: get_host_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific IP address

capabilities.name: search_shodan
capabilities.description: Search Shodan's database for devices and services

capabilities.name: scan_network_range
capabilities.description: Scan a network range (CIDR notation) for devices

capabilities.name: get_ssl_info
capabilities.description: Get SSL certificate information for a domain

capabilities.name: search_iot_devices
capabilities.description: Search for specific types of IoT devices

capabilities.name: get_host_count
capabilities.description: Get the count of hosts matching a search query without consuming query credits

capabilities.name: list_search_facets
capabilities.description: List all available search facets that can be used with Shodan queries

capabilities.name: list_search_filters
capabilities.description: List all available search filters that can be used in Shodan queries

capabilities.name: parse_search_tokens
capabilities.description: Parse a search query to understand which filters and parameters are being used

capabilities.name: list_ports
capabilities.description: List all ports that Shodan crawls on the Internet

capabilities.name: list_protocols
capabilities.description: List all protocols that can be used when performing on-demand Internet scans

capabilities.name: get_api_info
capabilities.description: Get information about your API plan including credits and limits

capabilities.name: get_my_ip
capabilities.description: Get your current IP address as seen from the Internet

capabilities.name: dns_lookup
capabilities.description: Resolve hostnames to IP addresses using DNS lookup

capabilities.name: reverse_dns_lookup
capabilities.description: Get hostnames for IP addresses using reverse DNS lookup

capabilities.name: get_domain_info
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive domain information including subdomains and DNS records

capabilities.name: get_account_profile
capabilities.description: Get account profile information including membership status and credits

capabilities.name: get_cve_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific CVE

capabilities.name: search_cves
capabilities.description: Search for vulnerabilities with various filters

capabilities.name: get_cpes
capabilities.description: Get Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) information for products

capabilities.name: get_newest_cves
capabilities.description: Get the newest vulnerabilities from the CVE database

capabilities.name: get_kev_cves
capabilities.description: Get Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) from CISA

capabilities.name: get_cves_by_epss
capabilities.description: Get CVEs sorted by EPSS score (Exploit Prediction Scoring System)
